settings.editor: NY-based Life Coach Brad is well-experienced at helping people to reach their full potential and achieve goals they never thought possible.

Coaching can be either face-to-face or over the telephone or SKYPE.  Each session is bespoke to each client, depending on the issues being addressed – sessions usually range between 1/2hr to 1hr sessions.
Achieve financial security and stability by organizing and structuring your energy
Learn how harmony in relationships within your family can be achieved following my guidance
Emotional health will give a boost in every aspect of your life - personal and professional.

settings.testimonial_content: "For so long I have yearned to take that which I intellectually understood, to reach me on deepest level. "
"First, I just want to say thank you! Of all of the programs and seminars that I have done (and there have been a lot)"
" Brad's guidance is hands down the one that has made the biggest impact in my life. Thank you, Brad."

settings.editor: I'm available on these social networks - feel free to ping me
